Html:
Hi,

I'm starting a university project in Windows Forms and i choosed this control ( last version of source code) for it.

I start my program on a specific  MainMap.Position and if i zoom it using the slider everything works fine, but if i use  the mouse wheel i notice that the very first time i move the wheel, that the coordinates change slightly . After the first move it doesn't change anymore, only on the very first one.

I'm using:  this.MainMap.MouseWheelZoomType = GMap.NET.MouseWheelZoomType.ViewCenter; 

Question:
Being my second time in C# i'm a bit of a noob, if i want to change, or create some new functions how is the procedure? Do i have to decompile-> change - >compile GMap.Net.Core.dll?

Many thanks...

i can't reproduce your issue, works as expected

p.s. to change functionality, download/fork the source code
